ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | prdscrngd.y | |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) |

| 4 |  | prdscrngd.r | |- ( ph -> R : I --> CRing ) |

| 6 | 5 | #P_ssriv | |- CRing C_ Ring |
| 7 |  | #P_fss | |- ( ( R : I --> CRing /\ CRing C_ Ring ) -> R : I --> Ring ) |

| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 8 | #P_prdsringd | |- ( ph -> Y e. Ring ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) = ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fnmgp | |- mulGrp Fn _V |
| 12 |  | #P_ssv | |- CRing C_ _V |
| 13 |  | #P_fnssres | |- ( ( mulGrp Fn _V /\ CRing C_ _V ) -> ( mulGrp |` CRing ) Fn CRing ) |
| 14 | 11, 12, 13 | #P_mp2an | |- ( mulGrp |` CRing ) Fn CRing |
| 15 |  | #P_fvres | |- ( x e. CRing -> ( ( mulGrp |` CRing ) ` x ) = ( mulGrp ` x ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` x ) = ( mulGrp ` x ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_crngmgp | |- ( x e. CRing -> ( mulGrp ` x ) e. CMnd ) |
| 18 | 15, 17 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( x e. CRing -> ( ( mulGrp |` CRing ) ` x ) e. CMnd ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_rgen | |- A. x e. CRing ( ( mulGrp |` CRing ) ` x ) e. CMnd |
| 20 |  | #P_ffnfv | |- ( ( mulGrp |` CRing ) : CRing --> CMnd <-> ( ( mulGrp |` CRing ) Fn CRing /\ A. x e. CRing ( ( mulGrp |` CRing ) ` x ) e. CMnd ) ) |
| 21 | 14, 19, 20 | #P_mpbir2an | |- ( mulGrp |` CRing ) : CRing --> CMnd |
| 22 |  | #P_fco2 | |- ( ( ( mulGrp |` CRing ) : CRing --> CMnd /\ R : I --> CRing ) -> ( mulGrp o. R ) : I --> CMnd ) |

| 25 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) ) |
| 26 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` Y ) = ( mulGrp ` Y ) |
| 27 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( R : I --> CRing -> R Fn I ) |
| 28 | 4, 27 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> R Fn I ) |
| 29 | 1, 26, 10, 2, 3, 28 | #P_prdsmgp | |- ( ph -> ( ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( Base ` ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) ) /\ ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( +g ` ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) ) ) ) |
| 30 | 29 | #P_simpld | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( Base ` ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) ) ) |
| 31 | 29 | #P_simprd | |- ( ph -> ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( +g ` ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) ) ) |
| 32 | 31 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) /\ y e. ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) ) y ) ) |
| 33 | 25, 30, 32 | #P_cmnpropd | |- ( ph -> ( ( mulGrp ` Y ) e. CMnd <-> ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) e. CMnd ) ) |
| 34 | 24, 33 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> ( mulGrp ` Y ) e. CMnd ) |
| 35 | 26 | #P_iscrng | |- ( Y e. CRing <-> ( Y e. Ring /\ ( mulGrp ` Y ) e. CMnd ) ) |
